trans-unit.source: Activate your virtualenv (important, because it will also install the new versions of upgraded packages in current virtualenv)
trans-unit.target: Activate your virtualenv (important, because it will also install the new versions of upgraded packages in current virtualenv)

trans-unit.source: Note: this packages installs the following requirements: 'docopt', 'packaging', 'requests', 'terminaltables', 'colorclass'
trans-unit.target: Note: this packages installs the following requirements: 'docopt', 'packaging', 'requests', 'terminaltables', 'colorclass'

trans-unit.source: An interactive pip requirements upgrader. Because upgrading requirements, package by package, is a pain in the ass. It also updates the version in your requirements.txt file.
trans-unit.target: Интерактивное устройство для обновления требований к трубопроводам.Потому что требования к модернизации,пакет за пакетом,это заноза в заднице.Он также обновляет версию в вашем файле requirements.txt.

trans-unit.source: An interactive pip requirements upgrader. It also updates the version in your requirements.txt file.
trans-unit.target: Интерактивное устройство для обновления требований к трубопроводам.Он также обновляет версию в вашем файле requirements.txt.

trans-unit.source: If no requirements are given, the command attempts to detect the requirements file(s) in the current directory.
trans-unit.target: If no requirements are given, the command attempts to detect the requirements file(s) in the current directory.

trans-unit.source: This cli tools helps you interactively(or not) upgrade packages from requirements file, and also update the pinned version from requirements file(s).
trans-unit.target: This cli tools helps you interactively(or not) upgrade packages from requirements file, and also update the pinned version from requirements file(s).

trans-unit.source: This will display any versions that can be upgraded, and helps you to manually main
trans-unit.target: Это отобразит любые версии,которые могут быть обновлены,и поможет вам вручную основной

trans-unit.source: To avoid installing all these dependencies in your project, you can install pip-upgrader in your system, rather than your virtualenv. If you install it in your system, and need to upgrade it, run pip install -U pip-upgrader
trans-unit.target: To avoid installing all these dependencies in your project, you can install pip-upgrader in your system, rather than your virtualenv. If you install it in your system, and need to upgrade it, run pip install -U pip-upgrader
